creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
description: portrait (bijin-ga); woman in profile from PL, wearing a white flower in her short, wavy hair, with a turquoise kimono and multicolored obi; woman holds a small container with 4 fireflies and a fan, and watches a firefly in ULC
marks: [昭和六年七月] {Shōwa rokunen shichigatsu} (July 1931) [深水] {Shinsui}
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: Firefly Catching
